allow: Bash(git add index.html yes.html bunny.jpg celebration.jpg)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Valentine''s Day website with interactive proposal

Create a romantic website for Valentine''s Day proposal with two-page flow:
main page with yes/no buttons and celebration page for positive response.

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Change font to Comic Sans MS for a more playful look

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
